mapper.sql: SERIAL_NO, ORDER_CLASS, ORDER_NO, ITEM_NO, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_DATE, VISIT_NO, ORDER_SUB_NO, ITEM_CLASS, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_SPEC, UNITS, REPETITION, AMOUNT, ORDERED_BY_DEPT, ORDERED_BY_DOCTOR, PERFORMED_BY, CLASS_ON_RCPT, COSTS, CHARGES, RCPT_NO, BILL_DESC_NO, BILL_ITEM_NO, CHARGE_INDICATOR, APPOINT_NO, RECIPETYPE, DRUG_SPEC, FIRM_ID, DOSAGE, DOSAGE_UNITS, ADMINISTRATION, FREQUENCY, DAYS, NAME, SEX, AGE, CHARGE_TYPE, ORDER_BY_NAME, MIN_SPEC, DIAG_DESC, BYJ_ATTR, JUST_RCPT_NO, JUST_INSU_FLAG
mapper.select:
select
from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS o where o.visit_date in(select c.visit_date from outpadm.clinic_master c where c.patient_id=#{0} and c.charge_type =#{1}) and o.patient_id=#{0} and o.CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select
from outpdoct.outp_orders_costs o where SERIAL_NO = #{0} and visit_date =#{1} and visit_no=#{2} and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and (((order_class = 'D') AND (((select count(*) from outpdoct.outp_treat_rec t,comm.dept_exam_item_dict e where t.visit_date = o.visit_date and t.visit_no = o.visit_no and t.item_code = e.exam_item_code and t.performed_by = e.performed_by AND t.performed_by = o.performed_by) = 1) and o.performed_by in ('0901', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) or (performed_by in ('0905', '0902') and byj_attr = 3 ) or performed_by not in ('0901', '0902', '0905', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) OR ORDER_CLASS NOT IN ('D')) and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select
from outpdoct.outp_orders_costs o where SERIAL_NO = #{0} and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and (((order_class = 'D') AND (((select count(*) from outpdoct.outp_treat_rec t,comm.dept_exam_item_dict e where t.visit_date = o.visit_date and t.visit_no = o.visit_no and t.item_code = e.exam_item_code and t.performed_by = e.performed_by AND t.performed_by = o.performed_by) = 1) and o.performed_by in ('0901', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) or (performed_by in ('0905', '0902') and byj_attr = 3 ) or performed_by not in ('0901', '0902', '0905', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) OR ORDER_CLASS NOT IN ('D')) and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select
from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS where SERIAL_NO = #{0} and ORDER_CLASS in('A','B','P') and PERFORMED_BY !='0819'

select DISTINCT PERFORMED_BY from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS o where visit_date =#{1} and visit_no=#{0} and ORDER_CLASS ='C' and ITEM_CODE IN (select hisitemcode from LIS_MACHINEHISITEM WHERE sampletype like 'è¡€%') and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select
from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS where RCPT_NO =#{0} and ITEM_CLASS in('A','B')
select * from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS o where visit_date =#{1} and visit_no=#{0} and ( ORDER_BY_NAME=#{2} or ORDER_BY_NAME=#{3} ) and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0
DELETE from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS o where visit_date =#{1} and visit_no=#{0} and ORDER_BY_NAME='s160' and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0
select * from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS o where visit_date =#{1} and visit_no=#{0} and ( ORDER_BY_NAME=#{2} or ORDER_BY_NAME=#{3} ) and order_no=0 and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select sum(o.charges) COSTS from outpdoct.outp_orders_costs o where SERIAL_NO = #{0} and visit_date =#{1} and visit_no=#{2} and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and (((order_class = 'D') AND (((select count(*) from outpdoct.outp_treat_rec t,comm.dept_exam_item_dict e where t.visit_date = o.visit_date and t.visit_no = o.visit_no and t.item_code = e.exam_item_code and t.performed_by = e.performed_by AND t.performed_by = o.performed_by) = 1) and o.performed_by in ('0901', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) or (performed_by in ('0905', '0902') and byj_attr = 3 ) or performed_by not in ('0901', '0902', '0905', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) OR ORDER_CLASS NOT IN ('D')) and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select max(o.days) DAYS from outpdoct.outp_orders_costs o where order_class = 'A' and visit_date =#{0} and visit_no=#{1} and PATIENT_ID=#{2} and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and ( ADMINISTRATION = #{3} or ADMINISTRATION = #{4} or ADMINISTRATION = #{5} ) and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select * from outpdoct.outp_orders_costs o where order_class = 'A' and visit_date =#{0} and visit_no=#{1} and PATIENT_ID=#{2} and ( ADMINISTRATION = #{3} or ADMINISTRATION = #{4} or ADMINISTRATION = #{5} ) and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0

select sum(o.charges) COSTS from outpdoct.outp_orders_costs o where SERIAL_NO = #{0} and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and (((order_class = 'D') AND (((select count(*) from outpdoct.outp_treat_rec t,comm.dept_exam_item_dict e where t.visit_date = o.visit_date and t.visit_no = o.visit_no and t.item_code = e.exam_item_code and t.performed_by = e.performed_by AND t.performed_by = o.performed_by) = 1) and o.performed_by in ('0901', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) or (performed_by in ('0905', '0902') and byj_attr = 3 ) or performed_by not in ('0901', '0902', '0905', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) OR ORDER_CLASS NOT IN ('D')) and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0
select DISTINCT ORDER_CLASS ORDER_CLASS from OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS where SERIAL_NO = #{0}
mapper.insert: insert into OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS (SERIAL_NO, ORDER_CLASS, ORDER_NO, ITEM_NO, PATIENT_ID, VISIT_DATE, VISIT_NO, ORDER_SUB_NO, ITEM_CLASS, ITEM_NAME, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_SPEC, UNITS, REPETITION, AMOUNT, ORDERED_BY_DEPT, ORDERED_BY_DOCTOR, PERFORMED_BY, CLASS_ON_RCPT, COSTS, CHARGES, RCPT_NO, BILL_DESC_NO, BILL_ITEM_NO, CHARGE_INDICATOR, APPOINT_NO, RECIPETYPE, DRUG_SPEC, FIRM_ID, DOSAGE, DOSAGE_UNITS, ADMINISTRATION, FREQUENCY, DAYS, NAME, SEX, AGE, CHARGE_TYPE, ORDER_BY_NAME, MIN_SPEC, DIAG_DESC, BYJ_ATTR, JUST_RCPT_NO, JUST_INSU_FLAG) values (#{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderSubNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repetition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderedByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderedByDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classOnRcpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{charges,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billDescNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{billItemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chargeIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{appointNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recipetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dosage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dosageUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{administration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{days,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{minSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{byjAttr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{justRcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{justInsuFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS
PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISIT_DATE = #{visitDate,jdbcType=DATE},
VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDER_SUB_NO = #{orderSubNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_CLASS = #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_SPEC = #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPETITION = #{repetition,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ORDERED_BY_DEPT = #{orderedByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDERED_BY_DOCTOR = #{orderedByDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERFORMED_BY = #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS_ON_RCPT = #{classOnRcpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COSTS = #{costs,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHARGES = #{charges,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RCPT_NO = #{rcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_DESC_NO = #{billDescNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BILL_ITEM_NO = #{billItemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHARGE_INDICATOR = #{chargeIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPOINT_NO = #{appointNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECIPETYPE = #{recipetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_SPEC = #{drugSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FIRM_ID = #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOSAGE = #{dosage,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DOSAGE_UNITS = #{dosageUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMINISTRATION = #{administration,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREQUENCY = #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DAYS = #{days,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGE = #{age,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHARGE_TYPE = #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_BY_NAME = #{orderByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MIN_SPEC = #{minSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIAG_DESC = #{diagDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BYJ_ATTR = #{byjAttr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
JUST_RCPT_NO = #{justRcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JUST_INSU_FLAG = #{justInsuFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORDER_CLASS = #{orderClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS set PATIENT_ID = #{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VISIT_DATE = #{visitDate,jdbcType=DATE}, VISIT_NO = #{visitNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDER_SUB_NO = #{orderSubNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_CLASS = #{itemClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_SPEC = #{itemSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNITS = #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPETITION = #{repetition,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDERED_BY_DEPT = #{orderedByDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERED_BY_DOCTOR = #{orderedByDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERFORMED_BY = #{performedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS_ON_RCPT = #{classOnRcpt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COSTS = #{costs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHARGES = #{charges,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RCPT_NO = #{rcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_DESC_NO = #{billDescNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BILL_ITEM_NO = #{billItemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHARGE_INDICATOR = #{chargeIndicator,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPOINT_NO = #{appointNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECIPETYPE = #{recipetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRUG_SPEC = #{drugSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRM_ID = #{firmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOSAGE = #{dosage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DOSAGE_UNITS = #{dosageUnits,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMINISTRATION = #{administration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREQUENCY = #{frequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAYS = #{days,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CHARGE_TYPE = #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_BY_NAME = #{orderByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MIN_SPEC = #{minSpec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIAG_DESC = #{diagDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BYJ_ATTR = #{byjAttr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, JUST_RCPT_NO = #{justRcptNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JUST_INSU_FLAG = #{justInsuFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORDER_CLASS = #{orderClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OUTPDOCT.OUTP_ORDERS_COSTS o SET CHARGE_INDICATOR =1, RCPT_NO=#{1} where SERIAL_NO = #{0} and PERFORMED_BY !='0819' and (((order_class = 'D') AND (((select count(*) from outpdoct.outp_treat_rec t,comm.dept_exam_item_dict e where t.visit_date = o.visit_date and t.visit_no = o.visit_no and t.item_code = e.exam_item_code and t.performed_by = e.performed_by AND t.performed_by = o.performed_by) = 1) and o.performed_by in ('0901', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) or (performed_by in ('0905', '0902') and byj_attr = 3 ) or performed_by not in ('0901', '0902', '0905', '3206', '4701','1201','1106')) OR ORDER_CLASS NOT IN ('D')) and CHARGE_INDICATOR=0
